name: Meera all the way!
reviewBody: All actors were well casted.The first song can be remembered for a long time and is the best song of the movie.Jayasurya does a good job with his jokes and actually gives a better performance than the other two who did average acting.Meera Jasmine is the best thing about this movie.Predictable story line but it captured the hearts of the youth. So far youth movies from him i.e nammal and now swapnakoodu have been hits and in my opinion only he can make the best youth oriented Mal movies. Prithviraj was known as a style icon in malayalam cinema after this movie.An average film overall with good songs.Bhavana looked pretty but did her role justice.Cochin haneefa is the surprise element in this movie.He may not be as you think.His best role so far.
